about_the_game:
*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.*~.

A rare planetary alignment has transpired in the universe. The deep sea needs your help pulling Mother Ocean from her depression spiral for the water ritual to be complete. You must collect and deliver life energy pearls to the Nucleoid Portal to awaken her. You’ll receive mysterious messages, learn how to astral project and meditate with consciousness warriors as you navigate a fantastic deep sea world full of weird, alien underwater creatures. Will you be around long enough to experience universal oneness?

Astrologically, on December 21, 2020 a great cosmic conjunction will occur: the two largest planetary bodies in our solar system, Saturn and Jupiter, line up in the same sign at the same degree. This event, which astrologers call The Great Conjunction, happens every twenty years—but 2020's event is extra special since Jupiter and Saturn haven't been this close since 1623! We hope this piece of art, released on and about this alignment, helps us all prepare to receive the blessings of change, unity and evolution.

Credits
Concept and art direction | Paloma Dawkins @Palomadawkins

Programming and game design | Kas Ghobadi @theStaticMan

Narrative and writing | Ashley Obscura @hologramrainbow
Promotional manager | Camille Verreault @CamilleVerreau1
Sound Effects | Margo
Music | :3lON, Margo, Caila Thompson-Hannat, Devon Hansen
Special thanks to | Ruben Farrus, Flan, Sean Lee, Laura Hirsh, Ken Perlin, Marie Foulston, Aya Avalon, Cody Walker, Kyler Kelly, Michael Johnson, Zach Xavier, Clement Shimizu, BabyCastles

With support from | Canada Council for the Arts, Victoria and Albert Museum

  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Mint 13 LTS, Fedora 16, fully updated
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD Processor, 3.5 GHz processor

  • Storage: 800 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.11.6 or higher
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD Processor, 4.0 GHz processor

short_description: Oceanarium is a meditative underwater interplanetary exploration game about all the forces that tie the strange creatures of the universe together. You’ll receive mysterious messages, learn how to astral project, and conquer gravity as you navigate a fantastic deep sea galaxy full of alien species.
